data.meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.
data.sentence: The word الرَّسُولَ comes from the root ر س ل and is associated with the meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.

data.meanings: to ascend, go down, overtop, surpass, branch, top of a tree, sprout, hair, consequence of a principle. Appellation of the ancient kings of Egypt and not the name of a particular king.
data.sentence: The word فِرْعَوْنُ comes from the root ف ر ع and is associated with the meanings: to ascend, go down, overtop, surpass, branch, top of a tree, sprout, hair, consequence of a principle. Appellation of the ancient kings of Egypt and not the name of a particular king.

data.meanings: to rebel, disobey, oppose, resist, transgress.
data.sentence: The word فَعَصَى comes from the root ع ص ي and is associated with the meanings: to rebel, disobey, oppose, resist, transgress.
The word أَخْذًا comes from the root ا خ ذ and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to pour forth, rain to in large drops, pursue eagerly.
data.sentence: The word وَبِيلًا comes from the root و ب ل and is associated with the meanings: to pour forth, rain to in large drops, pursue eagerly.
